argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lspval.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lspval.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lspval.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lspprcl.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 5 |  | lspprcl.x | |- ( ph -> X e. V ) |
| 6 |  | lspprcl.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) |
| 7 |  | lsptpcl.z | |- ( ph -> Z e. V ) |
| 8 |  | #P_df-tp | |- { X , Y , Z } = ( { X , Y } u. { Z } ) |
| 9 |  | #P_prssi | |- ( ( X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> { X , Y } C_ V ) |
| 10 | 5, 6, 9 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> { X , Y } C_ V ) |
| 11 | 7 | #P_snssd | |- ( ph -> { Z } C_ V ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_unssd | |- ( ph -> ( { X , Y } u. { Z } ) C_ V ) |
| 13 | 8, 12 | #P_syl5eqss | |- ( ph -> { X , Y , Z } C_ V ) |
| 14 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_lspcl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ { X , Y , Z } C_ V ) -> ( N ` { X , Y , Z } ) e. S ) |
| 15 | 4, 13, 14 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X , Y , Z } ) e. S ) |
